title: Portfolio
description: This my portfolio website built with React, featuring a clean and responsive design. It highlights my projects, skills, and achievements as a full stack developer, demonstrating my proficiency in modern web technologies and user-friendly interfaces.

title: Binaural Beats
description: This is a Chrome extension uses JavaScript's Audio Context API to produce distinct frequencies in each ear, creating binaural beats. This project showcases my skills in audio processing and web development, enhancing relaxation and focus.
